title: Chutiya cis*o packet tracer mini project
content: literally wtf is this I did everything I was asked to do now suddenly my teacher has changed the rules and wants us to add ssl vpn, nothings working. Shove these goddamn fruits up your ass

comments.body: Cisco packet tracer is one of the easiest tools to exist. read online and see what can be done
It's literally written in the banana problem guidelines that SSL VPN needed .
I'm not blind, saw that and asked my teacher about it and she said not needed. Now she suddenly tells us it's required.
Then it's not your fault . Your teachers a Lil stupid.
